comment: I would never take Dr. Malloy again! All test consist of 75 questions, and the week of an exam you have to read the following chapter and create a lengthy discussion thread. He has a huge ego that prevents him from doing his job and that's teaching. He lacks compassion for nontradional students and is unreasonable when it comes to grading.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--TEST HEAVY

comment: very straight forward class. if you follow the syllabus you will do well in the class

Read the book and ignore the lectures you will pass the class.  Quiz and HW questions are pulled from a CD made by the book authors.   If he forgets his copy of the answers for the handbook or HW questions he can't readily tell you what the correct answer is.

Do not take this teacher. He could care less about your grade, and you work your butt off in here. You have hw due at the beginning at every class which usually took me about an hour every night. Then, to top that off, he grades the hw ridiculously hard. Please do not take him.

This class is the hardect class i have ever taken! Homework due every day on top of 2 big projects, 5 hard quizes, and a comprehensive final! You will devote all your time to this class i suggest taking another teacher he has a huge ego and does not care about your grade at all!
Excellent professor. It is tedious in the beginning and gets better as the semester progresses. You will learn a great deal. I strongly recommend taking his class

Professor teaches very clearly and covers the material.  However tests can have ambiguous questions on them and he does not curve.  If you want an A try another prof if you want to learn about business law and dont care about grade take him

Like other posters, the class gets better as the semester goes along. In the beginning, I thought I would never pass and ended up with a B. Tests are somewhat vague. Requires reading the book and "all cases are fair game". Overall, I would recommend taking him.

The first quiz results were absolutely shocking to the entire class.  As the semester progressed, Dr. Malloy demonstrated a sincere desire for the students to succeed and was more than fair.  I really learned a great deal about Business Law and would highly recommend taking his class.

The first quiz results were absolutely shocking to the entire class.  As the semester progressed, Dr. Malloy demonstrated a sincere desire for the students to succeed and was more than fair.  I really learned a great deal about Business Law and would highly recommend taking his class.

He DOES curve the tests.  It took some begging and pointing out how bad the overall scores were but he did end up curving.  Very fair teacher, gives extra credit opportunities to help everyone out.  I would take his class again and recommend to others.  Good teacher!
Do not expect any grade curve even if the highest score on a test is a 75. Plan on studying and memorizing the complete text.
